Articles.Content:
I have found you though a long search for Beta space games, I come from a long line of MMOs the most recent a syfi space game. I have been looking for a game that was more of a realistic sim. I found it!

After reaching orbit with the Demo, I wanted to get to Mun. So here I am training away with full game. This game seems to have very great future.
Welcome and have a great time! You're right the future is bright (possibly due to explosions!)

Hi BlackHoleSun, welcome to the community

KSP's future is stellar, and you can see the soon-to-be-added features here, plus the lead Developers blog here

Welcome aboard, ensign! The game is completely worth it! (I being me investing most of my spare time into the game!)

If you have troubles with the mun or minmus, feel free to come back to the forums! We have plenty of tutorials and maths to see what you've done wrong.
